subject: linear_algebra
title: Power Iteration
contentHtml:
Power iteration is a popular numerical method to find the dominant eigenvalue and eigenvector of a matrix.

This iterative process starts with an initial guess and repeatedly applies the matrix multiplication until convergence.
name: Power Iteration Formula
problemHtml: Find the dominant eigenvalue and eigenvector of the matrix A using power iteration.
intuition: Power iteration leverages the fact that the dominant eigenvalue is the one that grows the fastest when iterating with the matrix.

title: Power Iteration
contentHtml:
Power iteration is a simple yet effective numerical method to find the dominant eigenvalue and eigenvector of a square matrix.

This technique is particularly useful when dealing with large matrices or those that are not diagonalizable by orthogonal transformations.
